comments.author: Bandlero.6312
comments.body: When accessing API:2/characters for Mesmer characters, I have noticed that the Backstory ids being provided are actually incorrect. The backstory (answer) ids being provided for Mesmers (esp. the final id which is the profession answer/question) is actually the answer/question for Revenants. I have seen this error for two different Mesmers on two different accounts, and both get the answer/question for Revenant “Blindfold” instead of the correct Mesmer profession answer/question.
